control

Class ClientController

  • java.lang.Object
    • control.ClientController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScreensIF

    public class ClientController
extends java.lang.Object
implements ScreensIF
    ClientController called by the GUI, create this instance and then manage "menu" of events because this controlled registered as handler of all triggers.
    Author:
    nire
